Introducing Mini PLAKKS, a thrilling tabletop football game that will ignite your competitive spirit! Aim to score the winning GOAL âš½ï¸ by strategically hitting the ball with your finger, but beware—each goal you score, it means your rival must remove one of their players! The pressure is on as you strive to be the last player with any sticks remaining, outmaneuvering your opponent at every turn.

Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled match with Mini PLAKKS' exciting gameplay mechanics. At the start of the game, both players select a card that grants a unique power, adding an element of surprise and strategy to each kick. Will you unleash the "x2 GOAL" card to double the impact of your next goal, forcing your rival to remove two players in one fell swoop? The cards offer thrilling opportunities to change the game's dynamics in an instant!

Strategic lineup creation is key in Mini PLAKKS. As a true Manager, you'll strategically position your six field players among the nine available holes. Make careful choices to maximize your team's strengths and exploit your opponent's weaknesses. And don't forget the movable goalkeeper, who adds an extra layer of excitement as you strive to save goals while also scoring your own!

Mini PLAKKS offers an engaging experience for players of all ages, from 5 to 99 years old. The game's compact, foldable design makes it easy to take on the go, allowing for impromptu matches anytime, anywhere. Customize your players with your favorite team's shirts, adding a personal touch to your Mini PLAKKS experience and immersing yourself in the world of football fandom.

Experience the intensity, strategy, and excitement of Mini PLAKKS. Will you emerge as the ultimate champion, outsmarting your opponent and leaving them without any sticks? Join the Mini PLAKKS revolution today and kick off thrilling matches filled with unforgettable moments!
